resources.string: The Rolling Loud Festival is a 3-day outdoor music event that started in Miami, FL and has become one of the biggest Hip-Hop festivals in the world. In addition, we are locating festivals within New York, California, along with plans to expand internationally to Eastern Asia and Europe in the near future.
Address: 347 Don Shula Dr. Miami Gardens, FL 33056
You will need photographic ID to get access to VIP sections + Receipt of purchase and Card used to purchase :)
Food will be available to all with different dietary requirements - Lockers will be available to all - Handicap accessible - Cannot sell or take professional photographs without our permission
Click one of the following icons below to take you to one of our pages.
Here are some of our headliners that will be performing next year, click on them for more info ;)
Here you can submit questions or improvements we could make to the app to make yours and others experiences better. Click below to enter :)
Input your advise and questions for our app and concert

One of the greatest multi-talented entertainers of our time and history, Breezy prolific hits ranging from R+B, Hip-Hop, Europop//EDM, Pop, Soul and more. Electrifying choreography along with his beautiful vocals will give everyone a good time.

The Weeknd has a voice with no measure in terms of the power and pain it brings to explore your emotions and memories to depths few have reached. The talented individual will perform to the highest degree.

Quite possibly the most famous artist in the world right now, everything he touches turns to gold..literally. Drizzy brings the bangers from slow, melodic jams to uplifting flexing to uptempo rap anthems.

The most accoladed individual in the rap game, Kendrick has deep, searing lyrics into a number of influential topics such as systematic racism, poverty and struggles with drugs that you will unite us all.
A newcomer to the Soul and Alternative R+B genre, SZA has already established herself as a mainstream artist, acknowledged by legends and her fellow competition.
Taking the pop world by storm, Billie Eilish brings more darker themes into fruition whilst keeping herself on top of the charts constantly, using bombastic production with angelic vocals.
A pioneer in the mumble rap game, Future brings his unique and melodic flow to any situation and turns it up to the next level.
Literally causing raves wherever he performs, Travis has trap anthems that will have the entire crowd jumping up and down due the endless energy he brings to every song.
